mapper.insert: insert into sch_dt(board_no, boarddt_img, board_con, num) values (#{boardNo}, #{boarddtImg},#{boardCon}, sch_dt_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select s.sch_date as schDate, s.sch_no as schNo, p.plc_title as plcTitle , (select plc_title from place p where s.sch_no= #{schNo} and p.plc_no= s.to_plc) as plcTitle1, s.distance, s.duration, s.transit from sch_dt s, place p where sch_no= #{schNo} and p.plc_no= s.from_plc
